divs: Sighting DetailsON NOV 18TH 2008 I WAS SITTING OUTSIDE (10:30 PM) FEEDING THE DEER APPLES IN MY YARD, WHEN I LOOKED UP AND NOTICED THE BALL OF LIGHT (AGAIN) ABOVE ROUND BUTTE. NOT WANTING TO DISTURB THE DEER, I STAYED STILL AND WATCHED IT .THE LIGHT MOVED A LITTLE IN THAT TIME . WHEN THE DEER HAD THEIR FILL AND LEFT. I WENT IN THE HOUSE TO GET MY CAMCORDER THE LENS KEPT FOGGING UP. SO (VIDEO NOT POSSIBLE)I DECIDED TO SEE IF IT WOULD MOVE WHEN I WENT TO THE POST OFFICE. AND IT DID . SEEN IT AGAIN OVER THE RAILROAD TRESTLE AS I WAS GOING HOME.LOST SIGHT OF IT WHEN PASSING BETWEEN BUILDINGS. WHEN I GOT HOME I DID'NT SEE IT ANYMORE THAT NIGHT.THIS IS THE THIRD TIME SEEING THE SAME TYPE OBJECT AND IM A LITTLE SCARED OF WHAT MIGHT HAPPEN IN A FUTURE SIGHTING. I KEEP PUTTING OFF REPORTING THE SIGHTINGS AS THEY HAPPEN . YOU KNOW HOW YOUR FAMILY LIFE TAKES PRIORITIES OVER OTHER THINGS.
